growthexperiments-desc: This extension contains experiments done by the Growth team.
growthexperiments-config-validator-addit: The new config has config keys that cannot be customized here.
growthexperiments-config-validator-datat: $1 is expected to be $2, but is $3
growthexperiments-config-validator-conte: Content-model mismatch: GrowthExperiments config file must have JSON content model, $1 detected
growthexperiments-edit-config-pretext: This page allows you to edit configuration of [[:mw:Special:MyLanguage/Growth|Growth]] team features. It will edit $1 on your behalf. You can see your changes in the page history of that page.
growthexperiments-edit-config-error-inva: Configuration page was not configured properly
growthexperiments-edit-config-config-cha: Configuration was changed. You might need to wait for a few minutes for the changes to take effect.
growthexperiments-edit-config-return-to-: You can [[Special:EditGrowthConfig|return back]] to the editing form.
